title: Breach
writer: Adam Mazer (screenplay), William Rotko (screenplay), Billy Ray (screenplay), Adam Mazer (story), William Rotko (story)
actors: Chris Cooper, Ryan Phillippe, Laura Linney, Caroline Dhavernas
plot: FBI upstart Eric O'Neill enters into a power game with his boss, Robert Hanssen, an agent who was put on trial for selling secrets to the Soviet Union.
